decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extensions and accommodation hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 131 Ashford Road and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
description: Retrospective application for the retention of the single storey rear extensions to the house along the boundary with No. 133.
